messages.commands.invalid-amount: The amount must be a positive number!
messages.commands.no-object: You must hold the minefield object!
messages.commands.invalid-power: Explosion power must be a value from 1 to 15
messages.game.success: You found all mines in %d seconds
messages.game.last-retry: This is your last try before cooldown.
messages.game.cooldown: Reached max retries, you are on cooldown for %d seconds.
messages.game.empty-hand: Your hand has to be empty to start a game.
messages.game.outside-area: You are outside game area, get closer to the game %d.
messages.build.no-permission: You dont have permission to build here.
messages.build.invalid-world: You cannot build minefields in this world
messages.build.name-in-use: Name must be unique for player, use /ms rename command.
messages.build.overlap: The game area overlaps an existing game area.
help.create.line3: easy/normal/difficult - Create a game similar to the original minesweeper.
help.create.line4: custom - Create a custom game, args: <rows> <cols> <mines>
help.list.line2: all - List all games, admin permission
help.power.line2: <game> - Name of one of your games
help.remove.line2: game - Remove your game with name <game>
help.remove.line3: or remove a game owned by player <player/game>, admin permission
help.remove.line4: player - Remove all games owned by <player>, admin permission
help.rename.line2: Rename the game held in your main hand to <game>
help.reward.line2: <game> - Name of one of your games
help.reward.line3: item - Opens the inventory of the game
help.reward.line4: each slot contains one reward. Player rewards gets used up,
help.reward.line6: cash - require Vault plugin and admin permission
help.starters.line2: <game> - Name of one of your games
help.starters.line3: <starter count> - Number of mines visible at start of game
